channel.title: A Few thing's please
channel.description:
On most delta server's you dont loose your items if your admin/owner. but on my delta source i do, how do i make it so i dont.
2. Can some1 tell me how to make a thing every 60 secs send a message saying VOTE. 3. how do i make it so when the owner's admins/mods/ect say's has logged in. Repp +, thanks.

item.title: A Few thing's please
item.dc:creator: @itai itai
item.description:
@itai wrote:

1.)Lol, sorry I forgot the code you add and where to add it, but there are tuts for it =P
2.) http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,427703.0.html#post_post_4
3.)Look up starter in client class until you see something like this.

if (starter == 1) { sM("Welcome to Historic-Vengence!"); }
You add that under those.

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Out 2 Get Me")) { yell("[OWNER AND CODER]Out 2 Get Me is now Online!"); }

Read full topic
